root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 3-3-3, translated into all languages

languages.language: The Global technical strategy and targets for malaria 2016–2030 was adopted by the The 68 World Health Assembly (https://apps.who.int/iris/bitstream/handle/10665/253469/A68_R1_REC1-en.pdf?sequence=1&isAllowed=y). The Assembly requested WHO to monitor the progress toward the GTS milestones and targets. The World Malaria Report is the process by which the GTS is monitored by country, WHO region and globally.
